column4: Hi ppl I'm all black and blue after a fresh 5.04 install - nothing works
sudo -s may give you a root login...
did you figure out how to add the icons to desktop? http://ubuntuguide.org/#showdesktopicons
I expect my gfx can can do better than now what is the tool to tweak settings ?
cat /etc/apt/sources.list, and paste that to pastebin.com, please.
yeah, you have all these weird repos there.
OK thnx what do U think about advice in http://ubuntuguide.org/#extrarepositories ?
many think its crap, its ok, I think, but it is kinda half ass, in that it doesnt tell you what it means to have all those enabled.
this is the one that will work, for sure: http://pastebin.com/291647 .
